biotools.summary:
MetaAnalysis Online is a web-based bioinformatics tool for fast and user-friendly meta-analysis of clinical and epidemiological data. It supports importing various input types (HR, OR, RR with CI, means ± SD, proportions, incidence rates) and automatically generates forest, funnel, and Z-score plots, as well as summary tables.

Key features:

Fixed or random effects models, heterogeneity estimation (I², τ²)

Subgroup analysis and flexible method selection (e.g., Mantel–Haenszel, DerSimonian–Laird)

Exportable plots (PDF, PNG) and customizable result displays
